Trade/Device Name(s): JBAIDS Influenza A & B Detection Kit
Submitter Information: The Surgeon General, Department of the Army
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for JBAIDS Influenza A & B Detection Kit utilizing rRT-PCR for qualitative detection of influenza A and B viral RNA on JBAIDS instruments
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for use on JBAIDS instruments for in vitro qualitative detection of influenza A and B viral nucleic acids in nasopharyngeal swab and wash specimens from patients with respiratory infection signs and symptoms
